Source.Name: qwt
Source.Summary: The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are primarily useful for programs with a technical background.
The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are primarily useful for programs with a technical background.
Source.Description: The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are primarily useful for programs with a technical background. Beside a 2D plot widget it provides scales, sliders, dials, compasses, thermometers, wheels and knobs to control or display values, arrays, or ranges of type double.

The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are primarily useful for programs with a technical background. Beside a 2D plot widget it provides scales, sliders, dials, compasses, thermometers, wheels and knobs to control or display values, arrays, or ranges of type double.
